title: Japan says Taiwan ship spotted near Diaoyu Islands
description: A Taiwanese activists' ship was spotted 44 kilometers off Diaoyu Islands and joined around a dozen vessels from the Chinese mainland Friday morning, AFP reported.
cleanContent: By Mei Jingya, Sina EnglishA Taiwanese activists' ship was spotted 44 kilometers off Diaoyu Islands and joined around a dozen vessels from the Chinese mainland Friday morning, AFP reported."By speakers and wireless communications we are warning the ship not to enter our territorial waters," a spokesman for Japanese coastguard's Okinawa branch said.But the Taiwanese activists refused to leave and told Japanese coast guardsnot to stand in their way.Banners reading "Protect Diaoyus" and "Get back Diaoyus" in Chinese were seen on board the ship, the Japanese coastguard said.																																																																								|  |
